abstract: Chinese Communist Party approves plan outlining national security concerns and detailing what it sees as domestic and foreign threats.
lead_paragraph: The Politburo, a council of 25 senior officials, ratified a blueprint setting out national security priorities and warning that the country faced daunting dangers.
snippet: The Politburo, a council of 25 senior officials, ratified a blueprint setting out national security priorities and warning that the country faced daunting dangers.

headline.main: Communist Leadership Approves Security Goals for China
headline.print_headline: China: Party Leadership Approves Security Goals
